name: Pops Masterson's Basketball Career Multiple Choice Quiz | Sports | 5 Questions

questions.text: In what year did Pops play his last game?
questions.explanation:
1961.

	Pops finished his career in style by scoring 43 points in his final game. He played from 1958 to 1961.

questions.text: What school did Pops play for?
questions.explanation:
Cass Midway.

	Pops was a 4 year starter there.

Post.

	He was a 5 foot 3 inch post player. Short even back then. But he had all the moves. If he was 6 foot 3 he would have played in the pros.

11.

	His number should have been retired.

questions.text: Who was his coach for his last game?
questions.explanation:
Samual Libsitz.

	Coach Libsitz retired after the 1961 season.
